price: From this [earth] We created you, and to it We will return you, and from it We will raise you once again.
arabic: ۞ مِنۡهَا خَلَقۡنَٰكُمۡ وَفِيهَا نُعِيدُكُمۡ وَمِنۡهَا نُخۡرِجُكُمۡ تَارَةً أُخۡرَىٰ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
